summary: A simple "Become a Bard" custom song replacer
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4]Introduction
I made this "mod" just now. The reason I have done this is because I love Malukah and her songs in TESO but I did not have the means to play the game. I live in a rural area in America that has an Internet with speed slower than a turtle race. Therefore, I can only enjoy the songs by importing them into Skyrim.

Note:This was made for personal entertainment. I just made it in the spur of the moment so I don't really know if this is appropriate. If it is not, mods can freely take down this.

What does this do.

It's just a simple file that replace your custom song book of "Become a Bard" mod into a TESO song book. I have no experience with modding so I can't make a separate song book. If someone wants it to be a separate song book, I don't know how to do so. If you don't want it to replace your custom songbook, I cannot comfort your need and you will need to ask somebody with experience in modding or LP. I will just put this here as an open resource for someone who can put it into a separate songbook.

The song was sung by Malukah so it is recommended to use a female character while playing these songs
It does not have all the songs from TESO because of the limit on custom songs in a single songbook.

Songs used:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rDdcVK47BY0&list=PL47ibCP70Cu0sOzub-XRJUaIRK7HzeWrx

Credits to Velenis for creating this playlist and as well as ZenimaxOnlineStudio for composing the songs

Three Heart As One - Covered by Malukah
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3TWLy7Iv0Gg

List of Songs and their durations, so that you can edit the performing animation corresponding to the song's time
Custom01 - From Dread Daedra Save Us - 2 : 10 - 130 secs
Custom02 - Mourning The Dead - 1 : 27 - 87 secs
Custom03 - Ode to the Queen Aryenn - 2 : 02 - 122 secs
Custom04 - Sway As We Kiss -  1 : 35 - 95 secs
Custom05 - The Ebonheart Pact - 1 : 59 - 119 secs
Custom06 - The Plane Meld (Molag Bal) - 2 : 07 - 127 secs
Custom07 - To Freedom ~High Rock~ - 2 : 06 - 126 secs
Custom08 - Three Heart As One - 2 : 12 - 132 secs
Custom09 - Warrior Goddess ~ Mother of Nords ~ - 1 : 22 - 82 secs 
Requirements:
Skyrim (heh)
SKSE
Become a Bard by LP and all its requirements
(http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=200602183)

How to install.

Install it with Mod Organizer or NMM or (your mod organizer).

Or do it manually by putting the xvm files into Skyrim\Data\Sound\FX\Mus\Bard\Custom

Credit:
Bethesda for the awesome game
ZenimaxOnlineStudio for TESO
Malukah for her beautiful composes and devotion to Skyrim musics
https://www.youtube.com/user/malufenix
LP for his awesome mod Become a Bard that enables me to role-play as a real bard
Steam. All heil Gaben

[/size][/b]
author: lichking164
